com.keyboardr.glassremote.client

Class RemoteMessengerService<S,R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • Service
      • com.keyboardr.glassremote.client.RemoteMessengerService<S,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - the type of messages this RemoteMessenger will send to the remote server. The corresponding MessageService on the remote server should receive messages as S or some superclass thereof.
    R - the type of messages this RemoteMessenger will receive from the remote server. The corresponding MessageService on the remote server should send messages as R or some subclass thereof.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StringRemoteMessengerService

    public abstract class RemoteMessengerService<S,R>
extends Service
    A Service that helps manage the state of a RemoteMessenger when accessed from multiple Contexts. Components can bind to subclasses of this Service and get a RemoteMessenger instance as a Binder implementation. This class does not yet support IPC, although future implementations might.
    Author:
    Joshua Brown

    • Constructor Detail

      • RemoteMessengerService

        protected RemoteMessengerService(UUID uuid,
                      MessageSender<S> sender,
                      MessageReceiver<R> receiver)
        Class constructor. Concrete implementations must have a zero-argument constructor.
        Parameters:
        uuid - a UUID shared between the remote server and this client. UUIDs can be obtained at http ://www.uuidgenerator.net/ and instantiated using UUID.fromString(String).
        sender - the MessageSender providing the implementation for sending S messages
        receiver - the MessageReceiver providing the implementation for receiving R messages
